job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
job_details.full_text:
Front-End Developer- AI Trainer (Dutch)

Outlier helps the world's most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?
       We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.
       About the opportunity:
          + Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
          + This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you
       You may contribute your expertise by
          + Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
          + Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models

profile_classification.rationale: The role focuses on providing human feedback to train AI models by crafting questions and evaluating code, rather than developing, fine-tuning, or deploying AI models. While it involves AI, it leans towards a human-in-the-loop annotation or evaluation task rather than core AI engineering.

phrases: engaging with these models as they learn to code
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to the process of training or interacting with AI models, which falls under the 'Modeling' category, even if the role is focused on human feedback rather than algorithmic development.

phrases: Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models
job_tasks.justification: The description explicitly seeks 'software engineers' and 'coders' and involves evaluating code, indicating a connection to software development principles and practices, albeit in an evaluative capacity.

phrases: no requirement for previous AI experience
soft_skills.justification: The explicit mention that previous AI experience is not required suggests that the role values the ability to learn and adapt to new AI concepts and tools.
The description highlights that projects involve 'discrete, highly variable problems,' implying a need for problem-solving skills to address these challenges.
